title: Dolphins to hire Packers linebackers coach as new defensive coordinator

sources.name: ESPN NFL
sources.title: Sources: Duggan to rejoin Hafley as Fins' new DC
sources.description: The Dolphins are hiring former Packers linebackers coach Sean Duggan as the new defensive coordinator on Jeff Hafley's staff, sources told ESPN.

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Dolphins to hire Packers linebackers coach as new defensive coordinator
sources.description: Sean Duggan follows Jeff Hafley to Miami; becomes Dolphins new defensive coordinator.
